emails.subject: RE: Antonio
emails.body_text:
Hello Bastien,

 

The following email address has been added to the Trafigura distribution list : 
Antonio.Tettamanzy@trafigura.com <mailto:Antonio.Tettamanzy@trafigura.com> 

 

Please let me know if you need anything else.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io> 
Sent: Friday, October 31, 2025 10:17
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Cc: Antonio.Tettamanzy@trafigura.com; Ruben Jesmiatka <Ruben.Jesmiatka@trafigura.com>
Subject: FW: Antonio

 

Hi,

 

Could you please add Antonio to the distribution list of Trafigura,

 

Thank you

 

From: Ruben Jesmiatka <Ruben.Jesmiatka@trafigura.com <mailto:Ruben.Jesmiatka@trafigura.com> > 
Sent: Friday, October 31, 2025 8:01 AM
To: Bastien Lambert <bastien.lambert@dnext.io <mailto:bastien.lambert@dnext.io> >
Cc: Antonio Tettamanzy <Antonio.Tettamanzy@trafigura.com <mailto:Antonio.Tettamanzy@trafigura.com> >
Subject: Antonio

 

Morning Bastien,

 

Would it be possible to add Antonio to our distribution list? He recently joined the bio team (coming from our NAFTA team) and will be based in Montevideo 

 

Best regards,

 

Ruben Jesmiatka 
Vegoils and Feedstocks Trader
Mobile: +41 76 840 47 84

E-mail: ruben.jesmiatka@trafigura.com <mailto:ruben.jesmiatka@trafigura.com> 

 

TRAFIGURA

Branch Office Geneva
1 rue de Jargonnant
1207 Geneva Switzerland

Phone: +41 22 594 6900 Fax: +41 22 594 6901

www.trafigura.com <http://www.trafigura.com/>
